#summary Opcodes for miscellaneous instructions

=== Miscellaneous Instructions ===

==== S2R ====
Store special register to general-purpose register.

Template opcode:
{{{
0010 000000 1110 xxxxxx 000000 aaaaaa00 00000000 00000000 00000000 110100
xxxxxx: destination reg
aaaaaa: 011001: SR_CTAid_Y;
	101001: SR_CTAid_X;
	100001: SR_Tid_X;
	010001: SR_Tid_Y;
}}}
